header.title: SmiX.MODs Feed News Center
header.description: Creates RSS & ATOM feeds input to your board - posts content into forums, shows news as ticking news block ...
header.author-notes:
This mod is formerly known as lastRSS agregator & lastRSS autoposting bot .MODs. Both were merged, reworked and lastRSS parser class is not used anymore.
This is initial release of this new version.

action-group.diy-instructions:
After editing all templates, copy file contrib/install.php to contrib/install.php. After running the install.php script you can delete the contrib directory. Navigate to: Administration Control Panel > System > Module Management :: Administration Control Panel > .MODs and create a Category for modules. Select “Feeds list” (SmiX.MODs Feed News Center) from the Module drop-down menu and click “Go”. Then click “Enable” on the Module. Do it again and select “General configuration” from the Module drop-down menu and click “Go”. Then click “Enable” on the Module. Browse to ACP > .MODs > Created category and set up everything as you want ...
Required ACP permissions are Board administration ...
